admin.featureSettings.features.auditLogg: Track all database changes and user actions
admin.featureSettings.features.dataExpor: Allow users to export their data
admin.featureSettings.features.electroni: Enable digital contract signing via Ejar
admin.featureSettings.features.familyMan: Enable family member invitations and shared access
admin.featureSettings.features.mobileApp: Enable iOS and Android mobile applications
admin.featureSettings.features.onlineSto: Public e-commerce store for products and services
admin.featureSettings.features.projectBi: Allow contractors to bid on projects
admin.featureSettings.features.pushNotif: Send push notifications to mobile devices
admin.featureSettings.features.receiptVo: Generate receipt vouchers with QR codes
admin.featureSettings.features.referralP: Allow users to refer others and earn rewards
admin.featureSettings.features.serviceRa: Allow customers to rate service providers
admin.featureSettings.features.smsNotifi: Send SMS notifications via Taqnyat (CITC compliant)
admin.featureSettings.features.sparePart: Require tenant approval for spare parts purchases
admin.featureSettings.features.vacationR: Allow employees to submit vacation requests
admin.featureSettings.features.vendorVer: Background checks and document verification for vendors
admin.featureSettings.features.whatsappN: Send notifications via WhatsApp Business API
